title: private bedroom in townhouse apartment
posting_body: A tenant moved into a recently renovated 4bd/3bth house and am looking for one other roommate.
Currently, One other college student in their early twenties are living here.
The room has a large window and a spacious closet.
The room is furnished, and I can also provide some furniture if needed (bed frame, mattress, nightstand, desk, and chair).
Also, Condo private room with bathroom is rentable.
Guys who are clean, considerate, and chill.
Must be able to reliably pay rent and utilities each month.
Safe neighborhood with a 1/2-mile breezeway behind the backyard for jogging.
House is located in a suburban area with a lot of great ethnic restaurants close by if you enjoy food.
If you are interested please leave you phone number.
House is located in 77072 with room.
